website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy market umbrella that is available in multiple color choices to add cheery style to your patio. Solar lights add a fun touch at night.
pros: LED lights on the umbrella's ribs glow up to 12 hours each night
The small solar panel on top of the umbrella doesn't take away from its style
cons: The vent at the top of the umbrella is very small, so strong breezes could tip it over

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella it is seriously amazing! I never take it down and the LED lights help so much at night. I recommend buying this product if you like to hang out on your patio and not have to much light at night. The color was exactly what I wanted. It is not heavy at all I can carry it on my own. Seriously happy about this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Not What Expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the umbrella I chose, and I love the solar light feature but there is a problem with water leaking from the small solar lights, when it rains.. if you do not count on keeping what is under the umbrella dry then I think it will work but this must be a flaw. Also the fabric can become pretty saturated fast during a light rain and cause the umbrella to slump while fully raised... Overall a little costly..I ordered 4, . took me about 2 weeks to get an adjustment on 2 I had to return, I kept the other two out of frustration... the pic shows the fabric after 10 min. of light rain...
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer57

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor design---important "metal" piece shears off with minimal force.  DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Like many others here, the concept of the product is enticing, but the quality is beyond disappointing. The "metal" button that controls the tilt feature is made of a material that could never withstand the shearing forces it is subjected to---it failed miserably, rendering the whole product useless. Until the manufacturer improves the quality of this important part, the product should be removed from the market. It is a sham that has basically stolen $65-$85 from the pockets of many. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: I just put it up so not sure how it will last but for now it a pretty color, its was easy to assemble, the lights are pretty cool. The only reason I gave it a 4 was because its not UV protected and it didn't didnt come with a tie down when not in use. I had to spend $10 more for UV spray and spray it on myself. Kinda odd other colors are cheaper then the deep purple. I only paid the extra money cause it's my favorite color. I would recommend this umbrella
customer_reviews.author: lorie stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not As Sturdy As Thought! I would like you to consider a NEW umbrella or a full refund!
customer_reviews.text: Had this umbrella for approx. 30 days. I was on the patio set listening to music on my iPad and the wind picked up suddenly and it literally bent the umbrella! Now the reason I like this umbrella was because it seemed to be very sturdy and not cheap. I was obviously wrong. It snapped and fell onto my glass patio table and shattered 3 out of 4 sections! I'm extremely upset that I really believed this was sturdy and heavier gauge than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Works great and wasn't overly priced.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for over a month now and it has withstood strong Midwest winds (we do not keep it open unless using it, but leave it upright in our stone table). The lights provide ambient lighting at night, which we prefer to bright light. The only thing keeping it from a 5, would be the density of the fabric. It isn't as thick as our other umbrellas have been in the past, but it does the job providing shade with the extra benefit having lights to enjoy an evening under. If the fabric was thicker, it would probably cost more. This product fit what we wanted to spend, so I really can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: S. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect umbrella for short summer season
customer_reviews.text: Overall Good umbrella. Fabric is bit thin, however provides enough shade and cover from rain. LED lights glow in the dark but don’t provide any light. You need extra source of light if you want to enjoy back yard in the evening hours. I really like the tilt function, cranking mechanism is solid and works well. Would be nice to have a storage cover, since it is going to be stored 9 months out of 12. It’s very compact, and light weight you can find a place for it in virtually any garage or basement.
customer_reviews.author: 3Modus Corp.

customer_reviews.title: Broke on a windy day
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy construction - only lasted a few months. In southern California we occasionally get strong winds. I had left the umbrella open, and the ribs bent. The original umbrella lasted 12 years. (I trashed this, and bought another from a local patio furniture shop.) The solar powered LED lights are rather nice, but the quality of construction is quite low. Not sure how long the lights would have worked. If your umbrella is in a location sheltered from strong winds, this might be good enough for your purpose (and is quite cheap).
customer_reviews.author: Preston L. Bannister

customer_reviews.title: checked top solar pad connection all good. there is a short on the switch which ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually zero stars... out of the box 4pm daylight lights came on, i turned off, 7pm wife comes home i go to show her and no lights, next day after sun light solar charge no lights. checked top solar pad connection all good. there is a short on the switch which is not accessible. Unit work for 1 minute and know is defective and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money. Umbrella won't stay upright after one summer of light use.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this umbrella for almost a year. Last summer, no problems. I put it up about 3 weeks ago, and opened it for the first time (this season) last weekend. For some reason, now whenever it is up it will not stay in the upright position. With a slight breeze, it moves a little for a few minutes and then, all of a sudden it goes into full tilt. I would NEVER purchase this again. With a big party coming up this weekend, I have to quickly find a new umbrella that won't randomly knock my guests out. The lights are nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Azzariti

customer_reviews.title: Where the hell is the solar panel???
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé put up the umbrella not realizing to check to see if the solar panel was attached. It clearly wasn't! I'm 3 months pregnant so I can't lift anything heavy and I wasn't there when he put it up. I tried turning the thing on after being in the sun all day. The lights were not working. I jumped up on the table to take a picture to see if the panel was there.... nope! JUST OPWN WIRES!! I'm livid.
customer_reviews.author: COLE83

customer_reviews.title: not a really good buy
customer_reviews.text: bought this item last year after reading the reviews. it really worked great. Stored it from late Oct till April this year. It worked well until July. I was outside and stood up from the table and it tilted suddenly hitting me on the head slicing my scalp. Had to go to get some stitches. After I got back I tried to straighten it and saw that the button was broke. Cheap cast aluminum had broken. Read all the new reviews and ay that I am not the only one this has happened to. Needless to say I really don't recommend this item. was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Love the lights!
customer_reviews.text: As it is the middle of winter I haven't really had the chance to use it yet. We did set it up one day. The solar panel charged the lights after just a few hours of charging time. The mechanism (hand crank) to open and close the umbrella works smoothly. The color was a darker navy as to be almost black. It is quite heavy. Be sure to get a sturdy base for support. Can't rate a 5 until we see how it holds up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s described in add.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this umbrella in 2017 and it was PERFECT! Unfortunately a storm threw it off a 2nd story balcony and bent it. It was still usable until now. I reordered the exact same thing and it’s totally different. It says it has a black steel coating and I can see right thru it. I’m returning it, again, and I’ve emailed the company.
customer_reviews.author: LESLI JONES

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful, but waited to leave review to see what it was really like
customer_reviews.text: Almost immediately after putting this up, the solar panel box came apart. Had to glue it back together, which seemed ok and I waited some more. From previous experience, I waited to post my review after a month of use, just to make sure and.... Right after the return window was up, the poles started having issues. I now have two poles that will not stay attached, making this umbrella pretty worthless. I think I may have actually used the umbrella a total of 7 times in the last month, so it wasn't from too much use.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Canter

customer_reviews.title: I loved this as long as it worked
customer_reviews.text: I loved this as long as it worked! The photo represents it well - the tilt button will NOT pop back into place for the umbrella to remain straight up and down. The spring seems to be weak or off-set somehow. Its constantly sideways. It still works but not how I'd like. We usually have it closed. I do love that there is an on-off button on the pole! Nice feature! And it gives plenty of light for a couple of people on a summer's night. If you were wanting a patio lit up I'd choose one umbrella for every 25 sqft
customer_reviews.author: S S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella with built in lights. The lights are a perfect, not too bright and not too dim. I love this umbrella the color is exactly as shown. It has a crank and tilt, my only wish on this umbrella would be that it would tilt with the crank instead of actually tilting it with a push button. I keep mine umbrella inside if i am not using it so I won't know about the actual wear and tear. I live in the desert and the sun always tears up everything so I am not taking a chance of this one fading or getting sun damage.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: As much as I liked the look of this, unfortunately it broke within a few days of use. The tilt mechanism was first to go. I reinforced it so it just stayed straight. The end of the umbrella arms kept piercing through the fabric, duct tape fixed that. Then the pole got bent and now I have my tilt back permanently. Last thing was the cable inside that runs the lights snapped, so no more led lights. My deck isn't that windy, I can only imagine that this umbrella is overpriced. If it was priced at $30 I would have known it was cheap and avoided it. But since it was $100 I thought it would be decent. Apparently not.
customer_reviews.author: thehumanknot

customer_reviews.title: Love the lights.  Cranks up and down smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella and well worth the money that we paid at $61.47. The lights work well and are perfect at night. Not to bright and not to dark. Highly recommend this umbrella. We always crank it closed afterward using it as the high winds will take out any umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how good this was gonna be but figured for the few dollars more, why not get the one with the leds in it. Got it setup and waited for it to get fairly dark out, turned it on and while I'm probably not gonna read a book by the light it puts out, it is good enough to have conversations and relax outdoors with. Family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: David Pfaff

customer_reviews.title: thin tubing.  Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Second umbrella just broke. The first arrived ripped at one of the ribs. Waited several weeks for a replacement. Was a little concerned whether the tubing would hold up. It seemed a little flimsy. Well, yesterday, a stiff breeze, and I emphasize the word breeze, and the bottom tubing bent over and broke like a pretzel. Not very impressed so far with the workmanship of this umbrella and not sure if they will take the second back. On a positive note, I love the solar powered LED lights
customer_reviews.author: Joe Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Just an OK product
customer_reviews.text: Had this umbrella for 15 months. Nice umbrella at first. Solar lights quit after about a year, fabric faded and the rope that is attached to the crank broke .Florida weather is tough on outdoor products mainly due to the heat and sun exposure. The umbrella was outside all the time since we have sunshine and pleasant weather all year round. Would have liked to have gotten more than a year from this product for what we paid. We have had less expensive umbrellas (without the solar lights) last longer.
customer_reviews.author: AHS

customer_reviews.title: First off the quality is amazing very durable and manufactured well
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin with this... First off the quality is amazing very durable and manufactured well. Everything functions as it should and the setup for the solar is quite easy. It looks awesome in color high quality again not like a cheap department store purchase. The lighting is what drove me to purchase this and it is awesome, it's a crowd pleaser. I have gotten some great compliments on this and I am always asked where I bought it from. Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lifewithoutshame

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, better than the one we're replacing
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, better than the one we're replacing. Realistically, an umbrella left in the California sun won't last more than a few years. Got this for a great price. Just saw the same one advertised for twice the price... Lighting is nice and subtle - just right for a little ambient lighting having a drink with a few friends.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Broke in 3 weeks in mild conditions
customer_reviews.text: Already broken. Just started using 3 weeks ago and the tilt mechanism failed and now it will not stay straight. Worthless now only 3 weeks after putting up. It has not been abused or subjected to bad weather. Just cheap and broke. And now return window is closed. Do not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: Faded quickly
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price and the LED lights. It looked beautiful at first but the color faded rapidly from navy blue to a faded grey-blue shade. I just purchased it in May and was hoping to be able to use it for at least a few summers but am now very unhappy with the color
customer_reviews.author: Nelslm2

customer_reviews.title: Solar lights did not work
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking umbrella but the solar lights do not work. We have tried testing with other batteries and also let it charge all day in the sun, but they still did not come on. It will do fine as a shade covering on our patio, but disappointed because the lights were the one reason I made this purchase. Be cautious if purchasing. Update - 1/31/18: Beware the pole down center is very thin metal. Mine dented on one fall from light wind and now have crooked umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: HANDS DOWN this umbrella surpassed my expectations! It's a perfect size for our large rectangular outdoor table and feels quality made. The LED lights aren't too bright and the on/off switch makes it easy peasy. It tilts, it cranks up and down, and has held up for the past few months we've had it. LOVE it and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Solar umbrella worked well but faded terribly
customer_reviews.text: Used this umbrella for a couple years. The solar lights worked very well. The material faded terribly very quickly and had to be replaced. It was a great umbrella just didn't look good for long.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella is excellent for the price. I spent some time looking and comparing, and others of the same size and quality were twice the price. The lighting is perfect, the on and off switch a huge plus. It is fading quickly, I bought a red one, but the sun here is very strong, and mine is in full sun all day long, so I did expect it. If the fading bothers you, a lighter color, perhaps tan would work the best.
customer_reviews.author: HAC

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product & customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love this LED umbrella! The lights are bright & the material of the umbrella seems to be a better water repelling material than most umbrellas. Unfortunately we forgot to let it down prior to a surprise summer storm & the wind carried it away & broke it near the crank. We emailed the seller to try and buy a replacement part & they replaced the entire umbrella for us at no cost. That is wonderful customer service & a wonderful product! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Comes assembled and True Red color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, true red umbrella. Was easy for me to put together as it came assembled with only the long pole to snap into the umbrella. The lights are a soft glow in the evenings. Looks fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Alligood

customer_reviews.title: Declined quality. Old version much better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same umbrella about 3 years ago and unfortunately the one I purchase this year is nowhere near the same quality as the older version. as you can see in the photo, some of the stitching has already came out which results in me having to place the metal Park back in the fabric every single time I put it up.
customer_reviews.author: Derek G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Just wish there were a few additions
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! We bought it for our first BBQ of the year and it was amazing. When we turned it on to show the guests, there was a rise of "ahhh/ooooo" with them. It's great fun and totally useful. Buy this! Just wish that there was a Velcro to keep it closed if we wanted and a bag to keep it in during winter months. But it wouldn't stop me from buying another one if this ever breaks
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I got the brown and it looks good still. There is nothing I would change with ...
customer_reviews.text: We are going into our third summer with this, and I must say this is a top 10 buy on Amazon. It's is so much brighter than we expected, and has worked everytime. Starting to show just a little wear now. I got the brown and it looks good still. There is nothing I would change with this umbrella. I will buy again when this one needs replacing, won't even look at another umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Looks great color bright
customer_reviews.text: So far so good received it today. I assembled it myself exceptional senior lady. It was easy to do. The only exception is there’s an extra piece I’m unable to figure out where it goes?
customer_reviews.author: ShaynaMadel

customer_reviews.title: Really Like this Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great Umbrella. We have been having many meals outside and this umbrella works great. Love the lights for the ambiance in the evening. Seems well made !
customer_reviews.author: JBennish

customer_reviews.title: Love the Hot Pink Color!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice umbrella! I bought the hot pink and it's very bright and looks great! Just set it up, so not sure on how sturdy it is, but so far, it seems great!
customer_reviews.author: TNo

customer_reviews.title: I love my umbrella so much
customer_reviews.text: I love my umbrella so much. Be sure to attach the solar wire before you put it up or you won't be able to reach it. It gives such a nice ambiance to my living room even though it's on my front porch. Pluse my dog can go outside in the dim light and j don't have to put the porch light on. I'm off the grid so I'm all about being conservative on power in the evenings. It's really pretty and looks like the stars over head. I really like it and the price was so good!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Have had problems from the beginning with this stand. The holes aren't set up right to keep the umbrella straight and it leans more and more to one side not matter how many times I tighten it. Has fallen over in light winds, so we haven't been able to use it much. Not at all happy because we have had a nice summer and wanted to be able to sit under it more often. the lights are nice when we have been able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: LNass

customer_reviews.title: Thin Skinned
customer_reviews.text: I've been overall very pleased with the functionality of this umbrella. No mechanical problems whatsoever. I don't use it on a daily basis, but kept it up & open most of the time. I am a bit disappointed that the color has been sun-bleached already. I do live in the desert, but it's a light brown color and it's only 6 months old. Now, I take it down and keep it in the shade when not in use. Luckily, it's very easy to do that. Still, it's a great value and I've already recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Teester

customer_reviews.title: Was happy with the product out of the box and all ...
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with the product out of the box and all lights worked! Down side is less than one season in and the black fabric is showing a lot of fading. With it being solar powered lights would have expected the fabric to withstand sunlight. Not so much.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Light is Too Blue
customer_reviews.text: The lights on this umbrella are a very "cool" light, meaning they are blue. If you're familiar with the Kelvin scale/light temperature, they're probably about K5000-6000. Candlelight is around K2000, and the light most people look pretty in, and that you want on your patio at night is around K2700. It's good quality, though, I'll give it that.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Baker

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed - my husband and I loved our beautiful red umbrellas when they arrived especially with the solar lights (nice effect at night); and I of course loved the reasonable price. However, the reason I am only rating them three stars is bc I've only had them Five Months (and winter months at that!) and I can see that they are already starting to show fading. Maybe not such a great value if they're going to only last one pool season.....
customer_reviews.author: Neca

customer_reviews.title: Color fades fast
customer_reviews.text: Got the blue, very disappointed that it faded in only a few months of mild SoCal weather. Keep it closed most days hoping to extend the life of the fabric, but now when I open it its an embarrassing tie-die. Despite being closed, stuck thru a table, & screwed into a base, the pole bent after a night of only mild wind. The lights work great though, last many hours & descent ambience.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs. One
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is an excellent purchase. I'm glad I brought it. I didn't know that the lights on it was solar I didn't pay attention. It's nice and heavy and does the job. The lighting are just right and bright for a night time outing
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Raafi

customer_reviews.title: Pole Bent in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate the umbrella but it is currently the end of June and we got in in April of this year, obviously we didn't start using it until late May. Two days ago we tilted it to shade the sun and there was no wind, the weight of it almost flipped our table that is stone and it bent the pole so now it's basically not working right. It is past time to exchange it. I am hoping to reach out to the seller to contact me in regards to a possible exchange, delivery was great, lights work great, just the issue listed above.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Color fastness is a problem. It WILL fade a LOT.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality out of the box. Very easy to put together. The LED lights are so nice and reliable. THAT SAID...If you leave it outside over a few months (upper midwest here) the color WILL fade. Like- considerably. After a year ours looked so rough I felt compelled to buy a new one. Not a big fan of the color fastness of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tarqu1n

customer_reviews.title: purple is so vibrant
customer_reviews.text: It arrived sooner than expected. My granddaughter gets a kick out of turning on the lights. They aren't very bright but do work
customer_reviews.author: D Francine Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella with lights
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter and husband purchased one from Amazon and loved it. I was happy to get one that had a crank handle to raise and lower the umbrella and was easy to put together. We love the solar panel and the LED lights. Perfect for our table near the pool. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Read and enjoy grandchildren

customer_reviews.title: Lovely umbrella with perfect cool lighting
customer_reviews.text: Lovely umbrella with perfect cool lighting. I loved it. Unfortunately, only got to use it twice in the 3 weeks I had it. Accidentally left it up in a rain storm with moderate winds and the umbrella took flight. Pole was bent beyond repai. Not the sturdiest of materials but at the price that is to be expected. Considering purchasing another one since I am unable to find a replacement pole that doesn't cost as much as the entire umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Looked like it would make a great addition to our patio
customer_reviews.text: Looked like it would make a great addition to our patio. Unfortunately, the top faded quickly. Within 2 months the color difference was highly noticeable in how the material faded. In addition, as we would leave it open some nights, I would find that the umbrella would bend on it's own at the elbow joint. The mechanism doesn't seem sturdy enough for minor wind gusts.
customer_reviews.author: Ray H.

customer_reviews.title: The structure of this umbrella is fine. Looks great at night with the LED lights ...
customer_reviews.text: The structure of this umbrella is fine. Looks great at night with the LED lights on. I bought the Navy/white striped. Had it 2 weeks and the navy has faded to a maroon color. I live in Texas and this sun is unforgiving. Maybe it will hold true to its color in a climate that is not so hot but isn't a patio umbrella suppose to stand up to the outside elements? Would not buy this again. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: cheryle rancourt

customer_reviews.title: Sh
customer_reviews.text: Bought in april, a little over two months ago...its fading already & some of the seams have shredded. I do not leave it up. Love the color & the lights, but supper dissatisfied. My $40 one from at home lasted 3 years. I only replaced it bc I got a larger table. So sad
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality fabric.......don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella looks nice and the lights are a wonderful feature. The problem is the fabric. I've had my umbrella for 3 months and it has white stripes where each arm is. It has faded from the sun in a very short period of time. It probably wouldn't look as bad if it faded all over, but the stripes look ridiculous. The umbrella itself is well made, but the cheap fabric makes it worthless.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Happy about my purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this umbrella in May of 2016 and are very happy with our purchase. The fabric has faded, but we leave it open in the sun during spring, summer, and fall. Best of all, we were able to locate replacement umbrella ready fabric and are ordering it today. It will be like new again for $25.00.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far as of 3/07/15 this umbrella has held up very well dealing with some high winds in San Diego. Lights work decent at night. It's been worth what I've paid for it. I'll review again in a few months and let you know.
customer_reviews.author: J Lange

customer_reviews.title: Right to the trash..
customer_reviews.text: This would have been great if it wouldn’t have to come to me in about 10 broken pieces. No solar lights, and looks like both the box and item had been trampled by elephants. This was definitely someone’s else’s trash. At least I got a refund. Wow...
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G.

customer_reviews.title: Great with some issues
customer_reviews.text: We love this umbrella but it is not made great. The first we returned and got a replacement. 3 weeks into using it (we use it once a week) and the top came disconnected from the pole. We put it back together and it is seems fine so far. It looks great and works great but disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Seeber

customer_reviews.title: I love this Umbrella but I had some problems with it
customer_reviews.text: I love this Umbrella but I had some problems with it. Material and the color Navy Blue is awesome. I sent it back and I will look for another similar. I would purchase from Trademark Innovations always super company. Quick delivery. Very reasonably priced. Guarantee their products.. Wonderful selections. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug Nana

customer_reviews.title: I love this Umbrella and want it to work for us
customer_reviews.text: We are on our third return if this next one has issues we are done. First one the material was sewn very badly second one the solar did not work. Thirds one the pole did not stay in to hold everything together. I love this Umbrella and want it to work for us , such a nice romantic feel when the little lites are on at night.
customer_reviews.author: Trix Corapci

customer_reviews.title: great umbrella for your patio table
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome umbrella. It is very sturdy and great quality. The solar lights are really nice to have at night when you have a dark patio. I am very pleased. The purple color is just like it is shown also.
customer_reviews.author: blonderobinbird

customer_reviews.title: At 10 to 15 mph tilt broke.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking foreword to having this umbrella work for me but on the first day with any breeze the tilt button broke. A few days later the lights quit working and I had to toss the whole thing out. Don't waste your time or money on this one. Buy something with more quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not as happy as last year...
customer_reviews.text: I’m torn between 3&4 stars. There is a one year warranty which hurts us in the northeast because the umbrella is not out during winter. Sadly this piece has broken and we are trying to use a hose clamp to keep it together. Had this not happened I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KAW143

customer_reviews.title: My Covid back yard remodel
customer_reviews.text: Loved this umbrella the color is so vibrant and covers my rectangle table. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice large Patio Umbrella! Very useful lighting at night!
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice large patio umbrella! The lighting is also very nice and easy to access. Haven't had it too long but seems to be holding its color well. Also, it looks very crisp and a lot more expensive than it was. All in all a great addition to our home!
customer_reviews.author: September Athens, GA

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to our pool area.
customer_reviews.text: These umbrellas are sturdy and really make the backyard pop. Purple is very colorful. :)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella! I just received it yesterday and the quality is even better than I expected. Someone wrote in a review about the brightness of the lights or the lack of brightness. I am not a fan of LED lights because typically the light is very harsh and that holds true for this umbrella but it is perfect for evening dining however, not necessarily for soft ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It faded within a year and the seems pulled apart
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella was nice looking and I loved the lights on it but it faded really bad within a 2 year time frame and the seems started to separate. There where also small thin fabric areas throughout the umbrella from the day it was purchased that stood out when the umbrella was opened.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Good Solar Umbrella For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella to replace one I had that blew out of the stand during high winds. This us an attractive umbrella and is exactly as advertised. The only drawback is that the lights are not very bright. I am comparing it to my previous solar umbrella with the same number of lights. You cannot really see well enough to read, but it works fine got entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Because it is vinyl, it is not very sturdy. We have wind in the evenings and always need to take it down. The lights work very well and it looks nice, but it is a bit flimsy in construction.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Lights don't work.
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with this umbrella when I received it and set it up. I loved the color and the festive and useful lights. Then, 2 days later, it rained. Not a lot of rain, just light rain... but it killed the lights. I thought maybe after the solar panel dried the lights would work again. Nope. Then, I manually dried it, replaced batteries, and still, dead lights. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Bought in May
customer_reviews.text: Ive had problems closing the umberlla the past couple of time I tried to lower it. I had to kind of help it out by pushing down on the arms. The top just broke off completely where the top tilts on the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Not made well.
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is very nice and the lights are great. However, the bottom pole bent almost completely in half during a typical thunderstorm with wind. The umbrella was not open and was sticking out of my table. The wind just about snapped it in half. I have had this less than 2 months! Love the features but will now look for something better made!
customer_reviews.author: Luxie

customer_reviews.title: top quality great stuff
customer_reviews.text: We have this on our balcony and its the BEST! Maybe my only complaint is that I would like the LED lights to be a warmer color for a more cozy feel and not so bluish white in color. but otherwise its very well made, and we use ours daily for the past year. Its top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G. Ging

customer_reviews.title: Not true color
customer_reviews.text: Said light beige. Can looking white and very cheap looking material. Would not recommend light beige!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: NO SOLAR PANEL/MISSING
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the umbrella... except there is no solar panel at the top. Part of it is there, but the 4 prong panel I need isnt so this umbrella is useless at my pool during the night.
customer_reviews.author: DJB38

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: If you need a soft light around your patio area it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but Faded Quickly
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella works fine, lights function perfectly, but the fabric fades terribly! I use them poolside so they aren't always open, but after maybe a month they were basically striped purple in the areas exposed to the sun.
customer_reviews.author: RitsyJack

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the lower pole, emailed the company, they emailed me same day and sent a replacement piece within days. Very impressed with such attentive customer service! I love the lights on the umbrella.. and it's very bright at night, not too bright, just right.. which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Katzen

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this big beautiful umbrella! Had an issue with the solar panel when I received it - and the seller sent me a replacement pronto! Great customer service! I feel like buying a couple I like it so much...cause when It fades over the years :(... Definately recommend it - if you are looking for a pretty colored 9ft umbrella - this one is it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy umbrella fabric fades
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella itself is sturdy and functions really well, however the fabric faded within just a few days. It serves its purpose but I am disappointed that I ordered navy blue and have ended up with a faded black-blue.
customer_reviews.author: Polly L.

customer_reviews.title: No lights after first use.
customer_reviews.text: I was so thrilled that when I pulled this out of the box the little lights lit up! It was a Wed and I had put it in the garage because of a storm that was coming. Saturday put it back up and the lights no longer worked. Totally bummed. But the umbrella works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase. They won't replace. Broke. And stuck with umbrella. Wasted money. Bought in December. Took out in March f
customer_reviews.text: We bought this umbrella in November when we purchased our new home. We recently just put it up and it cracked in half. Unfortunately since we bought it and now we cannot exchange it as we had not taken it out and inspected it. We figured December and January it was windy and cold and we would just wait. Extremely disappointed and upset we cannot return for a new one that is not broken.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Tersigni

customer_reviews.title: faded fast in the sun , construction a little weak
customer_reviews.text: faded fast in the sun , construction a little weak
customer_reviews.author: Mr Nice Guy!!

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased last summer & loved this umbrella, loved the ambiance when lit and worked great for one 3-4 month season. Brought it out this season set it ready to enjoy again but cranked up and it slid back down within 5 minutes. Obviously not going to work this season. The fabric also faded badly although not that noticeable on the tan color that I had purchased. Should have given the negative reviews more merit. Hope to find a better made product with the same solar light feature.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Good Patio Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The only grief about this umbrella is the post made out of plastic instead of metal like the one I owned before this one. Other than that, lights work great and the lights turns on and off automatically (Turns on at dusk and turns off after sunrise). Great patio umbrella overall!
customer_reviews.author: Andy K

customer_reviews.title: Well made this umbrella was an instant hit with our ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made this umbrella was an instant hit with our residents who wanted to sit outside as the sun went down. The lights were just right and it has held up well so far. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mc

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love the vibrant color. A nice plus is that the pole is all metal. My old umbrella developed wood rot and expanded making it hard to remove from table. That won’t be a problem on this one. I was slightly confused on how to attach the solar pack but I found a video online that showed me what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Yobabe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella, love the color and the lights look lovely. The only negative I have, you can't set it to come on and go off after say 4-5 hours, it stays on indefinitely till you switch it off. All my other LED lights outside come on when it gets dark and go off hours later. Same as my candles in side, I have them come on at 7.00 and they go off altamaticly at 11.00.
customer_reviews.author: From Ocenside Ca

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pop of color for my front porch. Big enough to really shade whole area. Easy to roll up and down. Only wish is that it had a tie to put around the umbrella when it’s closed. Other than that it’s perfect. Love the lights and the easy on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Kels&Vilo

customer_reviews.title: Wow -- love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Wow -- love this umbrella! Lights worked perfectly right out of the box and has a small switch on the pole to turn on or off with ease. Amount of light is perfect for outdoor dining and the tilt is awesome to block sun/create shade any time of day. Super stoked on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different umbrella if you want it to last.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Was missing solar panel on top out of the box, only a bunch of wires, so the lights didn't work, but party was today, so we decided to use it anyway. The fabric is extremely thin. Put it into our built in concrete circular table and when a light breeze came up the tilt mechanism immediately broke leaving the umbrella at a permanent 45 degree angle. Then the metal tubing on the pole bent 90 degrees. This all happened within a 15 minute time period. I guess you get what you pay for and this case, it was a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: The Moon Pieds

customer_reviews.title: the tan fabric fades to a light pink color in ...
customer_reviews.text: the tan fabric fades to a light pink color in about 6 months, they even sent me another canvas & it turned light pink as well.
customer_reviews.author: steve smart

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!!! The tilt in this umbrella snapped and broke with one tiny gust of wind. Ive had this umbrella for less than 2 months lights quit working last night, so total waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Fjcalcas

customer_reviews.title: ... umbrella completely broke after one season of use despite good care. String broke that lowers the umbrella then ...
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella completely broke after one season of use despite good care. String broke that lowers the umbrella then the button at the tilt point popped out. Unable to use now. Recommend buying a higher quality product. Reading several reviews with the same experience as me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in the Shade
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella gets 5 stars easily. It provides ample shade, tilts, changes height, and has solar lights! I originally wanted a blue umbrella, but my husband thought the red would like nice. He was right, the red looks great. The color is really vibrant. And the lights inside the umbrella, while not super bright, create a nice ambiance. Shipping was quick and set up was easy. I have no complaints about this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one week
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our deck because of the solar lights, when we got it didn't have the solar panel in it. When we got the panel it looked used! Now it's broke after one week, the lock to push the button in will not hole it straight. Plus there was small pin holes in the canvas. Very bad quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color fades quickly.
customer_reviews.text: We got a dark green one. After just a couple months it is very faded so it looked striped (since it is usually down). Otherwise, we like it. The lighting is really nice. Not harsh and illuminates the table well.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Changes color if exposed to SUN!
customer_reviews.text: Did not put this up until May. After a week in the Arizona sun, the perfect tan color changed to purple! You would think that since it is meant to be in the sun it would be colorfast or treated to keep its color. I like the umbrellas but it looks terrible on my patio. Amazon needs to tell the vender about this problem!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations Deluxe Solar Powered LED Lighted Patio Umbrella - 9' - (Purple)
product_meta.description: Size:9'| Color:PurpleThis deluxe solar LED patio umbrella measures 9' tall and provides plenty of shade on hot summer days. The canvas is 180G polyester so will stand up to the elements. Easy crank operation with a tilt option. Square solar panel at top provides a glowing light that lasts 9-12 hours (No electricity needed). Manufactured with superior quality by Trademark Innovations.
feature_bullets: 9' Tall, crank operation, with tilt option
8 Steel ribs, each rib has 4 LED lights
Features Black Steel Coating and 180G Polyester Fabric
Square solar panel at top provides a glowing light that lasts 9-12 hours (No electricity needed)
Manufactured with Superior Quality by Trademark Innovations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars884 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
